'''Material Share Bundle''' is available as part of the [[Adventurer's Share Bundle]] in quantities of 12, which can be purchased in the [[Gift Shop]] section in the [[Shop]] once per week for {{Item|Genesis Crystal|30|x=60}}.

One of the following can be selected upon using this item:
{{Card|Tile of Decarabian's Tower|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Boreal Wolf's Milk Tooth|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Fetters of the Dandelion Gladiator|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Luminous Sands from Guyun|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Mist Veiled Lead Elixir|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Grain of Aerosiderite|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Coral Branch of a Distant Sea|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Narukami's Wisdom|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Mask of the Wicked Lieutenant|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Copper Talisman of the Forest Dew|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Oasis Garden's Reminiscence|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Echo of Scorching Might|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Fragment of an Ancient Chord|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Dross of Pure Sacred Dewdrop|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Broken Goblet of the Pristine Sea|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Blazing Sacrificial Heart's Terror|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Delirious Decadence of the Sacred Lord|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Night-Wind's Mystic Consideration|1|show_caption=1}}
